entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Nanaimo
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:58 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nanaimo Airport 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -0.1°C
Pressure: 99.4 kPa
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -0.8°C
Wind: WNW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
